SELECT corInfo.id, corInfo.corporate_name, corInfo.review_status, corInfo.legal_entity, corInfo.summary, corInfo.certificate_for_uniform_social_credit_code, attach1.path AS path1, attach2.path AS path2, attach3.path AS path3, attach4.path AS path4, attach5.path AS path5
FROM em_corporate_information AS corInfo LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach1 ON corInfo.business_license = attach1.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach2 ON corInfo.legal_entity_identity_card_img_positive = attach2.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach3 ON corInfo.legal_entity_identity_card_img_rear = attach3.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach4 ON corInfo.contact_person_identity_card_img_positive = attach4.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach5 ON corInfo.contact_person_identity_card_img_rear = attach5.id WHERE corInfo.id=#{id}

SELECT * FROM em_corporate_information AS corInfo LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach1 ON corInfo.business_license = attach1.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach2 ON corInfo.legal_entity_identity_card_img_positive = attach2.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach3 ON corInfo.legal_entity_identity_card_img_rear = attach3.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach4 ON corInfo.contact_person_identity_card_img_positive = attach4.id LEFT JOIN em_attachment AS attach5 ON corInfo.contact_person_identity_card_img_rear = attach5.id ORDER BY corInfo.create_time DESC
